answers.answer: Wow, how exciting!! I think there is another girl on here that is having her baby the same day Danielle-something, she is being induced.I hope everything goes smoothly.
That's exciting!!  Wishing you all the best.
Some really exciting news, Good Luck!
your soooo lucky!! i want mine now too!!! good luck!!!
Congrats and good luck!! That happes to be my son's b-day, too!I'm sure everything will be fine; I'll be thinking of you!

Congrats to you! Don't be nervous honey you will be fine! Just tell yourself it will be over before you know it and your baby will be in your arms! I can't wait to see pics of your lil one! Good luck and hey you could be the first one on here who has their baby!
Congrats!!! I know we're all ready for this journey to be over and on to our lil bundles of joy!
Congrats!!  I know you will be so busy with your new baby, but try and update and post pics...I would also LOVE to know how your c-section went!  Good luck :)
Oh good luck!!  I would love to know how it feels to be days away from seeing the baby!!

question: Im going to have a scheduled c section first thing Thursday morning. She is already measuring over 8lbs and has gained a lb a week for the last 3 weeks, so my doctor said at 37 weeks I would either have to be induced or have a c section, and he recommened the c section to lower the risk that she would get stuck in the birth canal. He told us the chance was higher for her to have permanent nerve damage or even death if she got stuck and since this is my first baby and i have preeclampsia/high blood pressure, he recommended that i have a c section. SO thats what were going to do. I have to go in June 18th at 530am and my baby will be born shortly after that! Wish me luck...Im super nervous.
title: Scheduled C Section
